title: Methodical Agenda
description: Book five in the methodical series by Rebekah Roth continues along the journey to the truth behind the lies of one of the most life changing days of our lives. It would be best to read them in Methodical Illusion, Methodical Deception, Methodical Conclusion, Methodical Exposure and finally Methodical Agenda. Enjoy your trip!
author: Rebekah Roth
